text: Kodi ndi chifukwa chiyani inu simufuna kupereka mâ€™njira ya Mulungu? Mulungu ndiye Mwini wa zonse zili kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi. Palibe ofanana, pakati panu, ndi iwo amene amapereka chaulere ndipo adamenya nawo nkhondo poyamba kupambana kusanadze. Amenewa ndi a pamwamba kuposa iwo amene adapereka chaulere ndi kumenya nkhondo pambuyo pake. Koma kwa onsewa, Mulungu walonjeza mphotho yokoma. Ndipo Mulungu amadziwa zonse zimene mumachita
